item.description:
Re-invigorate and Re-inspire Your Spiritual Self
Spiritual Seminars with
Mother Clare Watts

Master Teacher Mother Clare Watts is presenting three spiritual seminars
at the Center of Light in New Haven. Learn to free yourself from fear.
Discover the joys of living single.
Reclaim your feminine spiritual power.

The Joy of Being Single
Friday, January 28 • 7:30 pm
Suggested Donation: $25 - Bring a Friend for Free!

There is so much pressure in our culture to be in a relationship. Why are we not okay just being ourselves? Being single can be a joyful experience of freedom and flexibility. Whether for a season, for a reason, or for a lifetime, the single life can be a regenerating, rejuvenating, and relaxing alternative to relationship-ho pping. First, however, you must be happy with your own company and fulfilled with your own endeavors; otherwise, what have you to bring to a relationship should one arise? Come! Learn to relax into the state of singleness and harvest the joys that spring from it.

Also this weekend:

Fear: Why We Are Afraid and the Path to Fearlessness
Thursday, January 27 • 7:30 pm
Suggested Donation: $25 - Bring a Friend for Free!


Women, Spirit, Healing, and Power
Saturday, January 29 • 10 am to 2:30 pm
Suggested Donation: $35 - Lunch Included - Bring a Friend for Free!
Please note: this seminar is for WOMEN ONLY.

group.name: Meditation & Inner Spirituality Group - New Haven

item.name: Seminar: The Joy of Being Single
